name: GLI@#%^TCH
description:
Overview:

GLI@#%^TCH is a puzzle game about a piece of data that, one day, comes across a glitch. The glitch allows the data to pass through walls. However, when the glitch starts corrupting the system, it's up to the data to puzzle the world back together...mostly.

Features:

  • Glitches
  • Puzzles
  • &*(#$)(*$#&)()**

Controls:

[WASD/Arrow Keys] - Move

[Space] - Pin Camera

[Esc] - Restart room

A Game a Week [Week 7]:

This game is my seventh game for "a game a week". Every week, I will force myself to make and release a (terrible) game. It's like a ransom, except games instead of hostages...probably. You can follow my progress on twitter (@enathang) or on my website (pixelmancer.io). Stay tuned!
